column4: How can i reinstall ubuntu ("Format it") without using the CD? I am using ubuntu now, and i just want it to go back to the way it was when i first installed it. Thanks! :)
What if i dont have access to the CD?
Its a long story about iso and CDs... i just cant do it with this computer.
then dl linux from the site, burn it and reload it
I dont have Windows, and i dont want windows :P
Probably not a good place to ask this... but could i also install Debian? or Fedora? or any other distro?
